TextView.android:text: Operators are used to perform operations on variables and values.\nIn the example below, we use the + operator to add together two values:
Python divides the operators in the following groups:

Arithmetic operators
Assignment operators
Comparison operators
Logical operators
Identity operators
Membership operators
Bitwise operators
Return true both statements are true
Return true if one of the statements is true
Reverse the result,returns false false if the result is true
Return true both variables are the same object
Return true both variables are not the same object
Returns true if a sequence with the specified value is present in the object
Returns true if a sequence with the specified value is not present in the object
